website_summaries.verdict: Food helps cats eliminate hairballs. Cats with sensitive stomachs and finicky eaters love this food.
pros: Cats show good health when eating this food and have plenty of energy
Owners like the list of natural ingredients in the food
Formula keeps cats feeling full, even when they eat less
cons: Carries a higher price point than other dry cat food options
Some owners report receiving food near the expiration date

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats love this food! I have one cat who is super active, but lost half his tongue in a freak accident. Because of that, he has trouble eating and needs extra “bang for his buck” with calories with the food he does eat. Fortunately, this food helps with that and helps keep his weight up (he lost 4 pounds after his accident and has gained back 2). Unfortunately my other cat has put on a little weight, as he likes it also, and I am unable to keep it somewhere where only the slender one has access. :/
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyedellen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe its healthy but my cats surely don't care for it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats really don't care for it. I was feeding them Blue Buffalo when the vet advised me to switch. My vet says that the Wilderness pet food just have good marketing and that they are seeing long term problems with Blue Buffalo fed pets. So I researched the recommended 'healthy' stuff. My fluffballs avoid eating it, actually boycotting until they figure out nothing else is coming. Ill try it out for a couple of more months, for a total of 4 before I try again. Keep looking if you want long lived healthy animals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Royal Canin Health Nutrition (formerly Fit 32) is a great product. I have 2 cats and I always put 2 bowls (one for each cat) for the whole day. I supplement their meal with Royal Canin Intense Beauty wet food. What I like about Royal Canin is that regardless of what cereal I give them, my cats love the taste. Sometimes, I'll even give them the Royal Canin for Persian just to vary it a little bit since one cat is a Persian and the other Himalayan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is half the price of buying it at any pet store.  Fantastic deal.  And my cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have an assortment of four kinds of dry food for our five cats and this is the item they eat the most of. It's very healthy and evidently tasty. In fact, I've even noticed a few kittens grabbing morsels of it, which is unusual for adult food (which is lower in fat and, thus, taste). But the main deal is the price. I was spending $31.99 at pet stores for this, and maybe - at best - $28.99 on sale. So, I'll be buying it from Amazon forever afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful visible results in two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I began buying Royal Canin when my vet prescribed it for a cat with crystals...I ended up feeding my other indoor cats Royal Canin because of the difference I saw...and the other cats ended up eating less and looking and acting obviously healthier too. So I began buying Adult fit 32 for the feral/stray cats we feed and it made a huge difference in their coats and energy..but surprisingly I found out it cost less than buying the cheaper brands because they eat less--and look fit instead of pudgy.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, get sample before purchase
customer_reviews.text: The cat hated it, but he loves Royal Canin Dachshund food! Go figure. Try asking for a sample from manufacturers if you are considering switching your cat. Especially if he is a picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: way better than driving to the store
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I love it, but all three cats think it's swell. Or at least okay enough to eat it, whereas with other dry foods -- even the standard adult Royal Canin -- they spend a lot of time pushing it around and coming home with mice. And we don't have to drive 15 minutes to spend more at the petsuperstore, or watch people's dogs peeing in the aisles there. So it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: happy trails

customer_reviews.title: I got my first pedigree cat.... ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pedigree cat....a "Ragamuffin" a couple of years ago. The breeders use this brand for their cats so that tells me it must be top quality. So I figured I would continue using this brand that my kitty, Sophie, was first fed as a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Royal Canin Adult Fit
customer_reviews.text: My breeder suggested Royal Canin for my Maine Coon. Since then I have adopted two other large cats, a Maine Coon mix and a Turkish Van. They are all big cats and need their weight controlled. The convenience of home delivery and competitive price are a win, win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Howes

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack-like substance
customer_reviews.text: This is supposedly a premium food, and my cats absolutely are fanatical about this food. But look at the ingredients... Corn! One of the first few ingredients on the list. My long-haired cat gobbles this up and then promptly pukes it up a short time later.
customer_reviews.author: melissa c.

customer_reviews.title: High quality food and good for picky kitties
customer_reviews.text: Love this food for my kitties! It has a good protien content and it makes their fur silky soft! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 indoor cats and I take care of 2 feral cats. All the cats love this food. It's a couple of bucks cheaper, buying through amazon, rather than retail store. UPDATE: many months later, all cats still like this food.
customer_reviews.author: aguybyadifferentname

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Price is really awesome compared to buying it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My cat only eats this now- Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy cat food from grocery stores - but the top and most expensive ones. Then I found bumps and rashes on our cat's forehead and for a while we couldn't figure out why. Then we tried to switch his food to Royal Canin. It took more than half year to see his forehead back to normal, but it worked very well. Royal Canin cat food ingredients are good quality and no other suspecious add-ons. Our cat now only eats this and it is favorite, the bumps and rashes haven't come back so we are all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our Outdoor cat loves it. I image we will keep buying it. Buy teh 7 pounder to keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with that product. My cat loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: royal canin is the only brand that my cat will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Candyce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cats won't eat anything else and I know I'm giving them a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Brighteyedwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this food for my cats and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Norita M. Nissen

customer_reviews.title: Good cat dry food.
customer_reviews.text: The Cats like it and eat it every day. My vet approves.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: The Cats Meow.
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats always meow when we go to open this bag....we think they are telling us to order more.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN_PrimeBuyer2020

customer_reviews.title: pricy but my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Well my cats love it. One is very picky and prone to UTIs, I have tried to switch them several times as this is a bit pricey but they eat this best.
customer_reviews.author: kjh

customer_reviews.title: I should say my cats did not like this. They vomited it back up several times
customer_reviews.text: I should say my cats did not like this. They vomited it back up several times. Would not buy again for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cats BEG for this food. We have to give to them in small quantities or they'll eat until they puke. Literally.
customer_reviews.author: ctescar

customer_reviews.title: Kitty good times
customer_reviews.text: Kitty is finicky as all get out. Kitty loves this.
customer_reviews.author: EmW

customer_reviews.title: Best food
customer_reviews.text: I love this food. I've tried several of Royal Canin's varieties and this one doesn't disappoint. My cats liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Meowin' good
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats love this food & do well on it. They also like the Royal Canin #28 food for mature cats. I keep both out & let them chose.
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it, so I do, too. I must trust her culinary senses, though.
customer_reviews.author: Arya Stark

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: All three cats between ages 1 and 3 love it.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Carly, my cat loves this...and it is good for her!
customer_reviews.author: nila a. vehar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cats love it .. We use it for night feedings !
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schmock

customer_reviews.title: He likes the Royal Canin best.
customer_reviews.text: The usual as always dry food for my cat. He likes the Royal Canin best.
customer_reviews.author: RomeoJuliet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. Fast shipping and delivery. Very satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it I always have it on hand and Amazons speed delivery makes sure I never run out
customer_reviews.author: Susan D Orte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Very nice to have this heavy bag delivered to our door. Goingto buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: suitable for samsquanches
customer_reviews.text: my cat samsquanch is very particular about her vittles, but the royal canin she reliably eats without too much complaining.
customer_reviews.author: kmacatak

customer_reviews.title: My cat *LOVES* this food and will always pass up ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat *LOVES* this food and will always pass up human foods (besides cheese) when she's fed Royal Canin.
customer_reviews.author: spankypants

customer_reviews.title: ... cats would have let me know if they didn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: The cats would have let me know if they didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't have any other thing but Royal canin... what's in it?!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

product_meta.title: Royal Canin Fit Active Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Size:7 lbOutdoor cats live a life of mystery. When they're away from home, you may not know what they're up to—but you know they're staying active. All that running around makes it hard for them to keep weight on. Plus, spending time outdoors can put stress on your cat’s immune system, leaving them vulnerable to germs. Royal Canin Adult Fit & Active dry cat food is targeted nutrition made for cats with access to the great outdoors to live a long, magnificent life. Tailored calorie levels give them the energy they need to be at a healthy, ideal weight. An exclusive complex of antioxidants helps promote immune health. Try pairing with Royal Canin Adult Instinctive wet cat food formulas for a meal your cat will love. With nearly 50 years of scientific research and observation, Royal Canin continues to deliver targeted nutrition to feed every pet’s magnificence. Not satisfied? Then neither are we. Our veterinary exclusive formulas are 100% satisfaction guaranteed. For more details contact us at 800-592-6687.
feature_bullets: Royal Canin Adult Fit & Active dry adult cat food is tailored nutrition for adult cats with outdoor access that are 1 year and older
Contains an exclusive blend of antioxidants to help support health of cats with outdoor access
Helps maintain an ideal weight with precise calorie content
Provides a balanced blend of vitamins and minerals to maintain optimal cat health and wellness
Perfect complement to Royal Canin Adult Instinctive wet cat food formulas

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
